articles.title: South Africa 2024 Elections LIVE: Voters line up for most closely watched elections since 1994 - Firstpost
articles.description: South Africa 2024 Elections LIVE Updates: According to social media reports, voting is going well in much of South Africa on this frigid winter morning, however some stations were delayed due to technological issues
articles.content: South Africans will vote on Wednesday in what is being billed as their country’s most significant election in 30 years, and it has the potential to plunge their fledgling democracy into unfamiliar te… [+2021 chars]

articles.title: The bird flu vaccine is made with eggs. That has scientists worried. - CBS News
articles.description: The spread of an avian flu virus in cattle has again brought public health attention to the potential for a global pandemic. Fighting it would depend, for now, on 1940s technology that makes vaccines from hens' eggs.
articles.content:
Even a peep of news about a new flu pandemic is enough to set scientists clucking about eggs.
They worried about them in 2005, and in 2009, and they're worrying now. That's because millions of ferti… [+5924 chars]

articles.title: 'Change in Vibrations': Strongest solar storm in 20 years leaves huge spot on the Sun - Business Today
articles.description: A massive sunspot, AR3664, is returning to view from Earth's side and causing the entire sun to vibrate unusually, observed through advanced helioseismology techniques.
articles.content: With Solar Cycle 25 approaching its peak between January and October 2024, scientists are eager to study AR3664 directly to understand the interplay between sunspots, solar vibrations, and magnetic f… [+5 chars]
